description: This file defines a singleton object 'NetworkModule' that sets up and provides networking components such as Moshi for JSON parsing, OkHttpClient with interceptors, and Retrofit for API interactions, serving as a network configuration utility in the app.

classes.name: NetworkModule
classes.description: A singleton object that provides configured networking components for API communication

methods.name: none (initializers and lazy properties only)
methods.description: Initializes singleton properties such as moshi, logging, headersInterceptor, okHttp, retrofit, and api
